title: Hotel Pandu Lakeside Tuktuk
content:
Hotel Pandu Tuktuk Lakeside is located in Samosir Island North Sumatera, Indonesia, exactly in Tuktuk tourism area, lakeside of Toba Lake.

Our Hotel is perfect gateway for family, couple or corporate while holiday or long stay in Samosir Island. With extensive garden landscape around old trees stretch down to Toba Lake, perfect for sunbathing and outdoor enthusiast. This Hotel is a calm and peacefull place, which has 20 Superior Rooms facing Toba Lake and either with terrace or balcony. This affordable Designer Hotel provides all you need for a relaxing holiday, long stay, refreshing with wide lake view, natural view, the fresh air, calm, clean, comfortable and peace.

The hotels has 20 Superior Rooms either Twin-bed and Double-bed, available on ground floor and first floor. All rooms of Pandu Lakeside Hotel with balcony or terrace facing to Toba Lake, with hot shower over bath tub.

There is a wide choice of leisure facilities and guest activities for both adults and children everyday.

Restaurant and Barbeque

Its breezy restaurant is popular with guests and passing trade due to its cleanliness and reasonable priced Indonesian, Chinese favorite and Sea Food Barbeque.

Pool Lake Side
The pool is located at our hotels lake side that guests should not miss out and with safety equipment and border, you can swim safely and enjoyable.

Cruise
You can explore the Samosir Island and Toba Lake in natural environment with your family

Internet
24 hours internet access at our Business Center.

Sun Bathing
A sunbathing area on the beach area which quiet and calm area, is good for relaxation and inspiring views of the Toba Lake.

Tourist Private Ferry
The ferry located just beside our hotel. It could take you to Samosir Island.

 

Pandu Lakeside Hotel is located in Tuktuk, 4 hours from Medan Polonia International Airport (Medan is the capital city of North Sumatera Province, Indonesia).
address: Tuktuk Siadong, Samosir Island 22395, North Sumatera - Indonesia
